name: Slime God
description:
Slime god is a game where you can Jump around, kill slimes, beat bosses, and so much more, to reach the final goal, become the SLIME GOD.

This gam is inspired by the basic platformer, and Benbonks game "Slimekeep". The game was created on unity, and all of it's development is on twitch! The game will continue being free for the time being.

A + D   for movement

Space  for jumping
Left Click  for shooting
E  to open chests

1: Download the most recent file of this game.

2: After waiting for download, left click the arrow, and click open.

3. Extract the file, open it, and play the application named "slime god".

4. Enjoy!
